member.name: T:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4
member.summary: Wrapper for libsimpleio IPv4 network services.

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4.INADDR_ANY
member.summary: IPv4 address for binding to all network interfaces.

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4.INADDR_LOOPBACK
member.summary: IPv4 address for binding to the loopback interface (aka localhost).

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4.MSG_DONTROUTE
member.summary: Don't use a gateway to send out the packet, send to hosts only on directly connected networks.

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4.MSG_DONTWAIT
member.summary: Enables nonblocking operation; if the operation would block, EAGAIN or EWOULDBLOCK is returned.

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4.MSG_MORE
member.summary: The caller has more data to send. This flag informs the kernel to package all of the data sent in calls with this flag set into a single datagram which is transmitted only when a call is performed that does not specify this flag.

member.name: M:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libIPV4.IPV4_resolve(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Resolve a domain name to an IPv4 host address.

member.summary: Start a TCP server and fork for each connection.

member.summary: There is urgent data to read.

member.summary: Wait for an event on one or more files.
member.param: Number elements in each of the following arrays.
Events to wait for on each file descriptor.
Events that occurred on each file descriptor.
Milliseconds to wait for an event to occur. A value of -1 means wait forever and a value of 0 means do not wait at all.

member.summary: Sleep for the specified number of microseconds.

member.name: T:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM
member.summary: Wrapper for libsimpleio PWM output services.

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM.ActiveLow
member.summary: Configure the PWM output as active low (inverted).
member.remarks: Not all platforms support active low (inverted) PWM outputs.

member.name: F:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM.ActiveHigh
member.summary: Configure the PWM output as active high (normal).

member.name: M:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM.PWM_configure(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Configure a Linux PWM output device.
member.remarks: On many platforms two more more PWM outputs may share the same clock generator, so configuring different PWM pulse periods may not be possible.
member.param: PWM output polarity (0 for active low/inverted or 1 for active high/normal).
member.remarks: Not all platforms support active low (inverted) PWM outputs.
member.param: Error code. Zero upon success or an errno value upon failure.

member.name: M:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM.PWM_open(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Open a Linux PWM output device.
member.param: Error code. Zero upon success or an errno value upon failure.

member.name: M:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM.PWM_close(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Close a Linux PWM output device.
member.param: Error code. Zero upon success or an errno value upon failure.

member.name: M:IO.Bindings.libsimpleio.libPWM.PWM_write(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Set a Linux PWM output device duty cycle.
member.param: Error code. Zero upon success or an errno value upon failure.

member.summary: Read-only property returning an integer analog input sample.

member.name: P:IO.Remote.ADC.resolution
member.summary: Read-only property returning the number of bits of resolution.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.DAC.#ctor(IO.Remote.Device,System.Int32)
member.remarks: Use Device.DAC_Create() instead of this constructor.

member.name: P:IO.Remote.DAC.sample
member.summary: Write-only property for writing an integer analog sample to a DAC output.

member.name: P:IO.Remote.DAC.resolution
member.summary: Read-only property returning the number of bits of resolution.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.GPIO.#ctor(IO.Remote.Device,System.Int32,IO.Interfaces.GPIO.Direction,System.Boolean)
member.param: GPIO pin data direction: Input or Output.
GPIO pin initial output state: true or false. Ignored for input pins.
member.remarks: Use Device.GPIO_Create() instead of this constructor.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.I2C.#ctor(IO.Remote.Device,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a remote I2C bus controller.
member.param: I2C bus clock frequency in Hz
member.remarks: Use Device.I2C_Create() instead of this constructor.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.I2C.Read(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Read bytes from an I2C slave device.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.I2C.Write(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Write bytes to an I2C slave device.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.I2C.Transaction(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write and read bytes to and from an I2C slave device.
member.param: Delay in microseconds between the I2C write and read cycles. Allowed values are 0 to 65535 microseconds.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.PWM.#ctor(IO.Remote.Device,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.remarks: Use Device.PWM_Create() instead of this constructor.

member.name: P:IO.Remote.PWM.dutycycle
member.summary: Write-only property for setting the PWM output duty cycle.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.SPI.#ctor(IO.Remote.Device,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a remote SPI slave device.
member.param: SPI transfer speed in bits per second.

remarks.para: Use Device.SPI_Create() instead of this constructor.
The actual SPI transfer rate will be the highest realizable rate that does not exceed the value specified in speed.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.SPI.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Read bytes from an SPI slave device.
member.param: Number of bytes to read: 1 to 60.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.SPI.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Write bytes to an SPI slave device.
member.param: Number of bytes to write: 1 to 57.

member.name: M:IO.Remote.SPI.Transaction(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write and read bytes to and from an SPI slave device.
member.param: Number of bytes to write: 0 to 57.
Delay in microseconds between write and read operations: 0 to 65535.
Number of bytes to read: 0 to 60.
